what_why_section.what_description: Crypto Futures Market is an instrument that allows you to take advantage of crypto price changes without having to own the coins, just open a long or short position according to market conditions. Start trading now at TRIV and explore various opportunities together

pemisahan_section.title_1: Safe Separation between Spot Assets and
pemisahan_section.description: With a clear separation between Spot and Futures portfolios, you can easily manage crypto assets and move assets between the two Portfolios.

invest_section.subtitle: Manage all of your portfolio and transaction in 1 device
invest_section.description: With Triv Indonesia, you can purchase and do staking with Cryptocurrency in one hand. Get the best experience in building your Digital Asset with Triv.
